content: {"name": "The ARC Food and Farm Fridays", "alternate_name": "", "description": "There are more food distributions at the location like non perish and produce groceries please find out when you will arrive", "email": "", "url": "https://buildingbridgesdc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1901 Mississippi Avenue Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Southeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20020", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8434383, "longitude": -76.97501729999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 900-8205", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Fresh produce"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
